name: Edentia
overview:
So if you’re looking for a complete and unique Costa Rica travel packages? Edentia is the solution for you and your family vacations, as we are the best virtual tour operator in the country with an exclusive variety of high standard hotels, activities, Costa Rica travel packages and family tours.

With us, you can choose to live a volcano expedition, relax at the beach, come together with nature, feel the adrenaline, spend an innovative Costa Rica family vacation, or just customize your desires as we’ll help you unwrap the magic of this paradise.

Every little detail of your trip will be managed by Edentia, a different, innovator and sustainable traveling concept in Costa Rica.

So what are you waiting for? Go ahead and browse through all of our categories, packages, hotels, and tours. Select the one that fits you or customize it!
